name: Jisc
description: Jisc, a UK digital agency for education, research, and innovation, is looking for a Junior Software Engineer to work remotely on a full-time, permanent basis for a salary around £26,000 p.a., focusing on the maintenance and development of the metadata management system for the UK Access Management Federation and offering a range of benefits including flexible work pattern, pensions, health care cash plan, learning and development support, and more.
